name: Instant Pot® Beef Stew
author: Andre
summary: The Instant Pot® is perfect for beef stew and it takes a fraction of the time compared to making it on the stove.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 cups dry red wine, such as pinot noir
1 (10.75 ounce) can  beef soup with mushrooms
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Add beef in batches, season with salt and pepper, and cook until browned on all sides, 3 to 5 minutes per batch
Add wine to deglaze the bottom of the pan, scraping up all browned bits
Pour in water and mix with wine
Add browned beef, potatoes, carrots, parsnips, onion, celery, and garlic to the pot
Pour in tomato sauce, beef soup, and cream of mushroom soup; mix well
Season with horseradish and Worcestershire sauce
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 35 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
